name: HKStatisticsCollection
desc: An object that manages a collection of statistics, representing the results calculated over separate time intervals.

items.name: func statistics() -> [HKStatistics]
items.desc: Returns an array of statistics objects representing the populated time intervals covered by the statistics collection query.

items.name: func statistics(for: Date) -> HKStatistics?
items.desc: Returns the statistics object for the time interval that contains the provided date.

items.name: func enumerateStatistics(from: Date, to: Date, with: (HKStatistics, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)
items.desc: Enumerates the statistics objects for all the time intervals from the start date until the end date.

items.name: func sources() -> Set<HKSource>
items.desc: Returns a set containing all the sources that had samples matched by the statistics collection query.
